Author: Sparkleworks
Text: I tend to have lots of inflammation generally due to allergies and some other health issues, and although I've never read anything that supports a link (nor have I looked for one), I've noticed that I have huge fluid retention when I'm sick.

Author: dynamicsystem
Text: I’ve never heard of a correlation between being sick and being bloated.. it’s probably just from the binging. Also dehydration makes you retain water, and you could be dehydrated from the b/p ing
